price: Ne placez pas avec Allah une autre divinité. Je suis pour vous de Sa part, un avertisseur explicite."
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tajʿalū maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
